name: TKey
short: Tillitis develops the TKey, an open and secure hardware device designed to protect secrets like private keys through transparency and strong security principles, supported by a bug bounty program to ensure ongoing resilience.

name: EspoCRM
short: EspoCRM is an open-source customer relationship management system that helps businesses organize sales, marketing, and customer support in one platform.

name: Matomo
short: Matomo is an open-source web analytics platform that allows businesses to track and analyze user behavior on their websites while maintaining full data ownership and privacy.

name: Site.pro
short: Site.pro is a cloud-based website builder with a visual drag-and-drop editor and a set of templates that allows you to quickly create landing pages, corporate websites, and simple online stores.

name: 4chan
short: 4chan is an imageboard community where users can share images and engage in discussions across a wide range of topics.

name: Keycloak
short: Keycloak is an open-source identity and access management solution that provides authentication, authorization, and single sign-on (SSO) for applications and services.

name: Artifex
short: The Artifex Developer Bug Bounty Program is designed to improve the security and quality of their key software products — Ghostscript, GhostPDL, and MuPDF.
